items.sentence: Tom isn\'t as good at French as he thinks he is.
Who\'s the man that\'s leaning against the gate?
All of Tom\'s children are able to speak French.
Apparently, Tom\'s car needs a new set of tires.
Don\'t worry. I told you everything would be OK.
I\'ll phone you as soon as I get to the airport.
I\'ll take care of my parents when they get old.
I\'m at the hospital. I got struck by lightning.
I\'m glad that I was able to help you last week.
I\'m going to Boston next week to see my sister.
I like swimming, but I don\'t like to swim here.
Could you please tell me again why you are late?
Could you please tell me your height and weight?
Could you recommend a nice restaurant near here?
Did you go straight home after school yesterday?
Did you really expect him to tell you the truth?
Did you see anybody else in the park that night?
My neighbor\'s son was killed by a drunk driver.
You\'re the only one who\'s not able to do that.
This is definitely more fun than doing homework.
